text: The Lander–Stewart Mansion and Stites Building are two historic houses in Phillipsburg, Warren County, New Jersey. The Lander–Stewart Mansion, built , is at 102 South Main Street and the adjoining Stites-Lander Townhouse, built , is at 104 South Main Street. They were added to the National Register of Historic Places on June 25, 2008. title: Lander–Stewart Mansion and Stites Building
